title: Statement by the President on Serbian National Day | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 15, 2011

 



Statement by the President on Serbian National Day




On behalf of the American people, I extend my best wishes to all those who are observing Serbian National Day.  The United States and Serbia share an important partnership, based on mutual respect and shared goals.  Here in America, those of Serbian descent contribute to the fabric of American life.  I look forward to a continued friendship between our two countries.
